thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kt30tomlin
title: Great location
text:
Just come back from 4 nights in New York, I would love to be able to give 5 stars but sadly not.
The location is spot on, turn left out of hotel for Times Square and right for Central Park, the only reason I dropped a star is because you have to pay for WIFI which is not great in this day and age, also as other reviews have mentioned the rooms are so hot even after turning the heating off completely, you can open the window but as also mentioned it's very noisy.
Yes the hotel is dated but I found this charming, the room was small but perfect as you only sleep in it, the bathroom was clean. You won't go wrong booking this hotel and we will return.
